property.name: text
property.value: Give server time to start Started in separate thread during initialize()

property.name: text
property.value: Settings: DE Director: stopWhenQueueIsEmpty false Model: enableBackwardTypeInference true ThreadedComposite: delay UNDEFINED for all

entity.name: SmartRoomClient
entity.doc: Execute the contained model in a separate thread with optional real-time properties.

svg.text: Make sure there is a director here!

property.name: correctValues
property.value:
{" Smart Room
"}

property.name: correctValues
property.value:
{" Smart Room
"}

property.name: text
property.value: This model launches a web server and provides a service available at http://localhost:8078/room Please run the model and navigate to that location (or run the model and double click on this comment).

property.name: text
property.value:
GET /room : Return page with picture of room and heat map Calls GET /room/markers and GET /room/data
The model is executed when /room/data is called, so that the heat map can be updated independently of the rest of the page.

property.name: text
property.value: GET /room/map : Fetches the data for the heat map and latest sensor readings, running the heat map model

property.name: text
property.value: GET /room/markers : Fetches locations of lights and sensors POST /room/markers : Updates the locations of the lights and sensors. Returns JSON "OK" message. Format must be JSON (due to dataType in POST request) to avoid generating an error in the ajax call

property.name: text
property.value:
postParameters port is a record type with fields lightsList and sensorsList of type string (Right click-> Customize -> Configure}
JSONToToken output port is an array type of record types with fields x, y, name, and value (sensors only) which are all strings x, y and value are converted to doubles

entity.name: FileReader
entity.doc: Read an entire file and output as a string

entity.name: IterateOverArray
entity.doc: Iterate a contained actor over input arrays

svg.text: Make sure there is a director here!
Convert string x, y coordinates to integers ExpressionToToken, ExpressionToToken2 output ports set to double (Right click -> Customize -> Ports)

Convert string x, y coordinates to integers ExpressionToToken, ExpressionToToken2 output ports set to double (Right click -> Customize -> Ports)
